metadata.title: CVE-2022-48737 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ASoC: ops: Reject out of bounds values in snd_soc_put_volsw_sx()We don't currently validate that the values being set are within the rangewe advertised to userspace as being valid, do so and reject any valuesthat are out of range.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
